game.name: The Pearl Princess
game.description:
The beautiful Pearl Princess Lumina is on the cloud nine today as she has received the invitation from the most popular royal ball event. She has already made all the arrangements for the party except selecting a dress for her. Would you like to take a chance to prepare her for this special event? Join The Pearl Princess game and get ready to change her overall look by applying your intense fashion abilities! Plenty of dress options will make it easier for you to complete task with ease. 
She wants to get a mermaid look to surprise people at the party event. Give her a fabulous hairstyle and then help her change the rest outfits in this brand new dressing game! On the left side of the screen, you would find all the dress and accessory options. Choose a nice top and combine it with a matching bottom outfit! Make sure to use some elegant jewelries on her beautiful neck and give her head a gorgeous crown. Complete her look with a nice and new mermaid tail!
You can also change the background in this cute free online dress-up game. It is important to work hard on her look as she wants entry today for a royal prom party. Put your unique fashion sense to assist the princess to prepare for the big occasion! Over the screen, you would spot all the necessary items used to make her a fabulous mermaid look. Good luck to play the role of a dress up designer in our all princess mobile games that can be playable online, no download required!
